short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visualize data-qa´s areas in screen when click extension icon.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Display QA attributes of HTML elements for your Unit or E2E testing tools.

This extension helps QA and testing professionals who use data-qa / data-test / data-testid / data-cy attributes in HTML elements by making the content of these data attributes visible on screen. This is ideal for use with unit testing tools such as Jest or End-to-End testing tools Cypress or Selenium.

If you need to display these QA data elements on screen, click the “HIGHLIGHT data-qa” button and you are done. If you want to remove them, click the “REMOVE data-qa” button.

You can also manually search for any HTML attribute of all available elements on the screen.

The extension displays the number of data elements found in the DOM. When the extension does not find any elements, it displays a link to a demo page to test the functionality.
